package.name: Velaris
package.shortDescription: Home screen calendar and weather widgets.

descriptionlist.description: Velaris will show you weather information and calendar events right on your home screen. All information is by default located at the top of the screen above the icons. Everything is in front of your eyes in the form of a carousel: calendar events, reminders, alarms. By scrolling, you can see the events of the next 7 days. Weather conditions and calendar events are updated automatically throughout the day and display the latest information.
